title: Minecraft Christmas Mod - Happy New Year!
description:
The Spirit of Christmas mod is a great way to get into the Christmas mood within Minecraft. Everything from gifts and ornaments to new mobs and a winter dimension, this mod has your Christmas needs covered.

 

The Christmas tree is a staple of the holiday and this mod makes it easy with a generator. Just place it and click and you have an instant tree. Of course you can also craft ornaments and presents to decorate your own tree if you wish.

 

You can even create a wintery cabin with the Cabin Generator. Itâ€™s a cozy spot to take shelter and comes pre-furnished. You may even spot some familiar friends. 

 

Thereâ€™s a slew of new Christmas Mobs added with this mod including reindeer, snowmen, gingerbread men and elves!
